text: Nau hanaāedauchauthee, nau haeauwaudananauau, Hechauhauthethāhe, Hechauhauthethāe,8.24 Possible missing “h” in “Hechauhauthethā(h)e” (“Master”). gaujauaudāhenauau, hathauhaugaunee Hanaāethauwauthede, nau hanaāeneudauau hasāse nau dasenaunanaunee naje: nau hanaāedauunauuu, nau hanaāedādauyauau.
